excerpt.rendered:
Product Description

With a subtle lodge look that takes inspiration from design history, the classic styling of the Frazier Park Collection will help you create a dining room environment that is a reflection of your preference for traditional spaces. The leg table’s apron features distinct framing that subtly defines the table’s profile. The brown cherry finish, which highlights the veneer, provides rich character to the wood’s grain.

6 Seater Dining Table dimensions: 

  • width:  36-40 inches
  • length: 68-72 inches
  • height: 29-31 inches

Chair:

  • Includes 6 chairs.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat Juth/rexine.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
